Last Update: Sun Jul 25 11:32:53 +0200 2010

Source Code

# from facets (http://facets.rubyforge.org)
class Hash
  def slice(*keep_keys)
    h = {}
    keep_keys.each { |key| h[key] = fetch(key) }
    h
  end
end unless Hash.new.respond_to?(:slice)
